data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Rukungiri to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rukungiri, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 16.91 percent of the people of Rukungiri are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 9,480 believers find a person of peace today among the 19,119 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Rukungiri, Uganda.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Gujarati people might believe through him.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 14,282 people in the state of Rukungiri who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 28,600 souls living in the state of Rukungiri with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Rukungiri, Uganda so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

location.name: Rukungiri
location.people_groups_list: Kalenjin, Pokot, Mvuba, Nubian, Chinese, general, Karamojong
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Mvuba (1,200), Nubian (37,000), Chinese, general (19,000), Karamojong (849,000)
